about_the_game:
NOTICE: Due to the 8k video used in this experience, AMD graphics cards are unfortunately not compatible. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Embark on a journey into the Hottieverse, the most innovative and high-tech music experience in the world. You’ll be front and center at a private performance by Megan Thee Stallion, with every beat and lyric amplified in stunning virtual reality. Imagine being at an exclusive VIP concert, but with the added thrill of diving into a fully-realized digital world.



Not everyone can enter. The gateway is guarded against intruders who might try to break in. Only those with the skill to hack through the security will find themselves face-to-face with Megan Thee Stallion.



The stage is larger than life. Experiencing her live-action performance just inches away makes the music seem louder, the beats stronger, and the excitement palpable.

Don't miss out on the most high-quality VR concert ever made. Step into the world of Megan Thee Stallion and let the music take over.



The free trial offers a preview of one interactive stage. The full ‘Enter Thee Hottieverse’ VR Concert can be purchased in the app and includes behind the scenes footage and shareable highlights.



Megan Thee Stallion is the first of many artists to be featured by AmazeVR. Be on the lookout for more VR Concerts this summer.

content_descriptors.notes: This VR Concert features explicit language and revealing costumes that may not be appropriate for all audiences.

name: AmazeVR Megan Thee Stallion VR Concert

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 October 2018 Update (1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or better. Unfortunately, AMD graphics cards are not equipped to handle the 8k video required for this experience.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

reviews:
“This isn’t your regular, pre-filmed concert stream projected in VR, but instead a custom-built world you journey through, watching Megan perform a selection of hits right in front of you.”
UploadVR

“I was floored when I hopped into the recently released Megan Thee Stallion VR Concert experience to find one of the highest quality VR live action performances I’ve ever seen.”
Road to VR

“The capture of the artist is something truly amazing. The quality of the image of her is impressive, and I would say almost unprecedented in a VR concert.”
Skarred Ghost
